keywords: convenience@add rice for a complete meal
subtitle: This recipe is good for any cut of meat, as it can be cooked slowly for hours. A great recipe for entertaining - just serve with rice or bread.

method.text: Sprinkle the cut potato with lemon juice, to prevent discoloration.
Heat the oil in a large pan. Fry the lamb and onion gently in the oil, until the onion is soft and meat is lightly sealed.
Add the passata. If needed, add some water so the meat is covered. Add the seasoning and herbs.
Cover and simmer on a gentle heat, until meat is almost tender. Test after 1 hour although tougher cuts may need up to 3 hrs.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil. Fry the okra lightly to brown.

Add to the stew with the potato. Cover and cook gently for another 45-60 min. If the sauce seems too watery, remove lid and raise heat to allow the sauce to thicken. Skim any surface fat from the stew before serving.

title: Yahni - Cypriot lamb stew
